block.p: BAXTER DIAGNOSTICS INC., Deerfield, Ill., has signed an alliance for research and marketing with Spectral Diagnostics Inc. based in Toronto. SPORT SUPPLY GROUP INC., Farmers Branch, Tex., said it was in talks to buy several companies, which it did not identify, that would add about $100 million to its annual revenue.

BAXTER DIAGNOSTICS INC., Deerfield, Ill., has signed an alliance for research and marketing with Spectral Diagnostics Inc. based in Toronto. SPORT SUPPLY GROUP INC., Farmers Branch, Tex., said it was in talks to buy several companies, which it did not identify, that would add about $100 million to its annual revenue.
VARIAN ASSOCIATES INC., Palo Alto, Calif., has acquired Interary International X-ray Tube Corp. of Charleston, S.C., for an undisclosed amount.
